name: Solaribus
description:
Solaribus is a 2D RPG puzzle game.

Restore the balance of the world by re-summoning the 7 primitive elements through the solar altar — the ancient technology of the solar runes.   

Compatibility issues: If you are using browsers like Firefox which does not allow HTML5 threads mode or your pc is using integrated graphic cards, it is recommended to download and play on desktop builds.

 

 

 

Controls
  • Escape - Toggle Pause Menu
  • WASD - Movements
  • Q - Open Manual (old parchment manuscript)
  • E - Interact

*remappable in the pause menu(ESC)

 

 

 

How To Play? (Puzzle Hints)
  • The 7 deities are the first 7 runes on the manuscripts — Gaea, Prometheus, Anemoi, Poseidon, Zeus, Erebus, Apollo. These deities are representing one of the 7 elements respectively.
  • The 7 elements are Earth, Fire, Wind, Water, Thunder, Darkness, Light
  • try to decipher 7 combinations to activate 7 stone lanterns.
  • The manuscript is important! Example for the first sequence —
    • The Earth: the element earth, and the deity Gaea
    • Gave birth: (you give birth to a piece of what?) Do you consider this as the strength or weakness?
    • Own will: When you have your own will, will you follow others instructions fully? What is the last slot left?
  • You may Google it up if you are not familiar with the deities in Greek mythology.

*some information is intentionally missed out as part of the puzzle design
